channel.title: Make hp higher
channel.description: ok can sum 1 tell me how to make jads hp higher cause its only 56 :/ i need to raise it to like 3000 so if anyone can tell me thanks!

item.title: Make hp higher
item.dc:creator: @Rich_Dude99 Rich Dude99
item.description:
@Rich_Dude99 wrote:

qazws:

ok can sum 1 tell me how to make jads hp higher cause its only 56 i need to raise it to like 3000 so if anyone can tell me thanks!

First thing first, please watch your grammer. It’s a rule here.

Anyway, like “ownage plz” has said you must go into npc.cfg and seach the JAD’s ID (2745) and change the current health points to the amount you desire. Just to let you know… If you change it to 3000 as you are saying you are going to have to kill the JAD a few times in a row.

-Hope this helps,
Rich Dude99

Read full topic

item.title: Make hp higher
item.dc:creator: @qazws qazws
item.description:
@qazws wrote:

ive tried that i cant find the place to change it here is the jad thing

hitDiff = misc.random(10); } if (GoodDistance(npcs[NPCID].absX, npcs[NPCID].absY, EnemyX, EnemyY, 1) == true || npcs[NPCID].npcType == 3200 || npcs[NPCID].npcType == 2745) { if (npcs[NPCID].actionTimer == 0) { if (RingOfLife == true && EnemyHP <= (int)((double)((double)EnemyMaxHP / 10.0) + 0.5)) { server.playerHandler.players[Player].SafeMyLife = true;

and second

} if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == 2745) { ItemHandler.addItem(6570, npcs[NPCID].absX, npcs[NPCID].absY, 1, GetNpcKiller(NPCID), false); }
